Articles.Content:
Hello.

I suggest the inclusion of random celestial bodies for exploration in the main game, such as asteroids, moons or commets. (See the recent ESA mission).

I suggest the inclusion of this option in the main menu, when we are setting the options to start a new game.

All regards.

Hi there.

The items you've suggested are exactly what are in the What Not To Suggest List under "Universe". It's not that they're bad suggestions, it's that we've had quite a lot of suggestions like that already.

You might also want to check the game you've bought. It's had asteroids in ever since the NASA/Squad collaboration that resulted in the Asteroid Redirect Mission in v0.23.5!

HTH. Closing thread. Have a nice day!
